definition: to pass through one's hands/to handle/to deal with
classics/sacred book/scripture/to pass through/to undergo/to bear/to endure/warp (textile)/longitude/menstruation/channel (TCM)/abbr. for economics 經濟|经济[jing1 ji4]
hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.english: Both tumors were successfully resected without recurrence.
sentences.chinese: 二者皆經手術成功切除腫瘤且未再復發。

sentences.english: After surgical excision of the tumor, the patient was discharged smoothly. Pathology showed meningioma.
sentences.chinese: 此蝶鞍上腫瘤經手術切除後病理報告證實爲腦膜瘤。

sentences.english: During surgery, a rectal perforation was found to have caused the air leak.
sentences.chinese: 經手術後發現直腸穿孔爲氣腫的原因。

sentences.english: We were very impressed by your handling of this affair.
sentences.chinese: 你經手處理這問題的方法給我們留下了深刻的影響。

sentences.english: Adrenocortical adenomas proved histopathologically in 31 cases on CT scans were reviewed.
sentences.chinese: 本文報道31例經手術病理證實的腎上腺腺瘤。

sentences.english: These dumplings come courtesy of a Taiwanese restaurant chain called Din Tai Fung No matter.
sentences.chinese: 現在經手的是臺灣一家名叫鼎泰豐的連鎖店。

sentences.english: CT findings of 3 cases of renal hydatid cyst verified by operation were reported.
sentences.chinese: 本文報告經手術證實的3例腎包蟲囊腫的CT表現。

sentences.english: To hand, some of it inevitably sticks to the fingers that it touches.
sentences.chinese: 這筆款幾經轉手，必然有一部分被經手人染指。

sentences.english: Combined therapy of surgery and oral terbinafine led to clinical and mycological cure.
sentences.chinese: 經手術切除皮損聯合口服特比萘芬治癒。

sentences.english: It does not pay its handlers.
sentences.chinese: 經手此事的人無利可圖。

sentences.english: They are kept always in an acid pH when in responsible hands.
sentences.chinese: 在負責任的人經手時，它們總是被飼養於酸性水裏。

sentences.english: Results 15 patients with acute volvulus were confirmed during operation.
sentences.chinese: 結果15例急性腸扭轉病人均經手術證實。

sentences.english: Working days start from the date receiving this form.
sentences.chinese: 以經手人收到申請單之日期爲工作天之起算日。
我只要求一點經手之勞。
該律師經手承辦這宗案件。
